title: Senior Network Engineer, Optical Design
description: Google is proud to boast a network that provides service to millions of Internet users around the world...
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, a related field, or equivalent practical experience. 6 years of experience with one or more optical technologies such as client transceivers, optical metro, long-haul DWDM systems, or submarine systems. Experience with planning and designing networks (e.g., multiple sites, multiple products, etc.)
preferred_qualifications: Experience in one or more programming languages such as C++, Go, or Python. Experience with network equipment manufacturer or network operator in engineering or design role. Experience with submarine cable system design, manufacturing and operation. Experience with open cables design, commissioning and acceptance, operations and management. Experience with optical networking devices, optical fibers, optical modules and subsystems. Experience with submarine line terminating equipment (SLTE) operation and management.
responsibilities: Drive the quantifiable analysis of measurements, or data and capacity forecast models for making networks more scalable, efficient, and deliver predictable user experience. Evaluate the current inefficiencies, complexities, and flaws in network systems, and propose designs, software, and processes to improve them. Develop software that improves the performance, safety, transparency, and manageability of network systems. Participate in rotating schedules with other team members, including weekends.
